data.value: Learning is fun for your child

data.value:
Kidzone Kindergarten is committed to providing a program that focuses on the development of young children through a well-rounded experience and inspires a love of lifelong learning.

We believe that children are born eager and ready to learn anytime for growing themselves!

data.value: Maintain a classroom full of warmth and acceptance. Our classroom is where your kids' opinions and ideas will be heard and valued.

data.value: If the question that you are looking for is not listed, please send it to us and we will get back as soon as possible.

data.value: As your child enters kindergarten, we know that you probably have a lot of questions. We want to make sure that you and your child feel at home here at Webster, so we have come up with a list of the most frequently asked questions about this very important first year of school.

data.value: General capabilities within the our Curriculum make up a set of knowledge, skills, behaviors and dispositions that can be developed through all the learning areas: Literacy, Numeracy, Information and communication technology competence, Critical and creative thinking

data.label: What if my child gets sick?

data.placeholder: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. data.value: We have a School Nurse or Health Clerk on campus 5 days/week. Your child will be evaluated and treated immediately. You will be called right away if the injury is severe, or if your child needs to go home due to illness.

data.value: We highly recommend you to let your child learn one foreign language because it's very easy to learn another language in their childhood. But language course is optional.

data.label: What are your pick up procedures?

data.placeholder: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. data.value: All children will be walked to the pick up lines under the shade structure on the east side of the parking lot. Children will be supervised at all times. You may either wait in the car line for driveway pick up or park your car in on the street or in the St. James lot and walk to pick up your child. Please wait outside for your child.

data.value: You can purchase uniforms at the PTA uniform sale before the first day of school, or at any major retailer, including Target, Sears, JCPenney, WalMart, The Childrenâ€™s Place and Landâ€™s End.

data.value: We are so grateful to have Anna study at Kidzone for the Last three years. Thank you so much for giving her the opportunity to experience that learning is fun at an early age. Kizone marks a new start for Annaâ€™s life and she has gotten tons of love, joy and happiness during this wonderful 3 years at Kidzone.

data.value: We want to raise a kind, thoughtful, and intelligent child in an environment where these qualities are valued. Kidzone is the perfect school for our child â€“ small classes, excellent and engaged teachers, caring community, and strong academics. It is more than I could have hoped for.

data.value: Are you still worrying about whether or not your child is ready for kindergarten? Or you cannot find the ideal answer for some questions in your mind? Here, at Kidzone, we care about you as much as about your children. Please let us know if there is something bothering you, we are always here to help.
